title: Bug 14813ClassCastException creating a new Run configuration
description: Bug 14813ClassCastException creating a new Run configuration
OB: In order to run or debug a class, one creates a configuration.Clicking aroundin the "New Configuration" dialog, the workbench will terminate with aClassCastException.
SR: In order to run or debug a class, one creates a configuration.Clicking aroundin the "New Configuration" dialog, the workbench will terminate with aClassCastException.
